materials:
[1] James D. Plummer, M. D. Deal, and P. B. Griffin, “Silicon VLSI
Technology-Fundamentals, Practice and Modeling”, 2000, Prentice
Hall.
[2] Hong Xiao, “Introduction to Semiconductor Manufacturing
Technology”, Prentice Hall
[3] Stanley Wolf and Richard N. Tauber “Silicon Processing for the
VLSI ERA, Volume1: Process Technology”, 1986, Lattice Press.

Processing Technology”, 1990, Addison-Wesley.

Science: For Integrated Circuits in SI and GaAs”, 1989,
Prentice Hall.
